DOC.brief_summary: This study is an evaluation of the survival of the implants and bridges, quality of prosthetic work and patient satisfaction after immediate loading of the implants in a totally edentate upper and lower jaw.
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Loading of Implants in Totally Edentate Upper and Lower Jaw. Trial to Evaluate Survival of the Implants and Bridges, Quality of Prosthetic Work and Patient Satisfaction
DOC.detailed_description: This study is an evaluation of the survival of the implants and bridges, quality of prosthetic work and patient satisfaction after immediate loading of the implants in a totally edentate upper and lower jaw.
